Plot the volcano figure

Source: R/pVolcano.R
pVolcano.Rd

Plot the volcano figure

Usage

pVolcano(mydata, foldchange_threshold = 1.5, p_threshold = 0.05)

Arguments

mydata

the result of function "differential_metabolites",have column "Name","Fold_change", "Padj_t"

foldchange_threshold

the fold change, default is 1.5,1/1.5

p_threshold

the p value cutoff, default is 0.05

Value

test

Examples

diff_result <- DM(2**meta_dat,group)
#> OPLS-DA
#> 31 samples x 219 variables and 1 response
#> standard scaling of predictors and response(s)
#>       R2X(cum) R2Y(cum) Q2(cum) RMSEE pre ort pR2Y  pQ2
#> Total    0.485    0.864   0.697 0.194   1   1 0.05 0.05

p_volcano <- pVolcano(diff_result,foldchange_threshold=1.5)
#> [1] 1.5
p_volcano
#> Warning: ggrepel: 15 unlabeled data points (too many overlaps). Consider increasing max.overlaps
